A red icon is an item worn by players during a game of Soul Wars. The icon, alongside a red cape, are automatically equipped by players in the red team upon the start of a game. When a game of Soul Wars ends, both the cape and icon are removed from the player.

Like the Barbarian Assault icons, the red icon is worn in the jaw slot, a back-end Worn Equipment slot system where facial hair is placed,[1] and cannot be seen in the Worn Equipment interface by players.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
9 December 2020
(update)

The item was added to the game.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • As items in the jaw slot remove existing facial hair from the player's model, a fake beard is built into the equipped model to appear as if it was never removed[2]. Thus, the red icon has 16 different equipped models, one for each facial hairstyle that currently exists.[3]

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Mod Wolf. "Poll 67 Updates and Hosidius Improvements." 30 May 2019. Reddit Forums.
  2. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 30 May 2019. (Archived from the original on 6 June 2019.) Mod Ash: "This deletes your beard if you have one, so the [Barbarian Assault] icons have fake beards built into them so that your appearance doesn't change."
  3. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 30 May 2019. (Archived from the original on 6 June 2019.) Mod Ash: "[A jaw slot item] actually does replace your beard - so the 4 [Barbarian Assault] icons now have multiple alternate versions, one for each beard style, so that the model is of icon+beard."

[[File:Red icon detail.png|left|120px]]
A '''red icon''' is an item worn by players during a game of [[Soul Wars]]. The icon, alongside a [[Red cape (Soul Wars)|red cape]], are automatically equipped by players in the red team upon the start of a game. When a game of Soul Wars ends, both the cape and icon are removed from the player.

Like the [[Barbarian Assault]] icons, the red icon is worn in the jaw slot, a back-end [[Worn Equipment]] slot system where facial hair is placed,{{CiteForum|author = Mod Wolf|url = https://archive.fo/X9ifv|title = Poll 67 Updates and Hosidius Improvements|forum = Reddit|postdate = 30 May 2019}} and cannot be seen in the Worn Equipment interface by players.

==Trivia==
*As items in the jaw slot remove existing facial hair from the player's model, a fake beard is built into the equipped model to appear as if it was never removed{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1134035660447330304|date=30 May 2019|archiveurl=https://archive.fo/jzRA8|archivedate=6 June 2019|quote=This deletes your beard if you have one, so the [Barbarian Assault] icons have fake beards built into them so that your appearance doesn't change.}}. Thus, the red icon has 16 different equipped models, one for each facial [[hairstyle]] that currently exists.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1134141975995781120|date=30 May 2019|archiveurl=https://archive.vn/7FnBw|archivedate=6 June 2019|quote=[A jaw slot item] actually does replace your beard - so the 4 [Barbarian Assault] icons now have multiple alternate versions, one for each beard style, so that the model is of icon+beard.}}
